column4: heres my issue with wireless...i installed ubuntu originally....wireless driver was available in proprietary drivers list...good to go...well today i updated/rebooted and lost wireless......soooo i decided to just reinstall from live usb....now when im in live usb i have wireless....when i boot into hdd the option to select my additional wireless driver is there but when i apply it hickups...
...and does not activate....can anyone please help me
pm me if you can help
is the module loaded? check lsmod. is the radio on? check rfkill
